featured.text: When the ship stopped, I eventually saw Tim, and I was very, very relieved that we were still alive.

definition.zh_def: 感到輕鬆或解脫的，通常是因為擺脫了壓力或困擾。
definition.en_def: Feeling free from anxiety or distress; having had a burden lifted.
definition.example: She felt relieved after finishing her final exams.
